text:
this kind of service, but the school system stations (generally a 10 watt
FM) cannot justify going beyond their boundaries of their small university
or secondary school system.
We would like to urge the Commission seriously to rethink their
approach to the solution of the 10 watt problem. Specific recommendations
(rather than a waiver of the rules) should be made to protect those 10 watt
FM stations who are fulfilling their obligations to their license and to
institute specific procedures to eliminate those who are not.
Archie M. Greer
Director of Radio
AG: jo
